name: Spectrecular
description:
Created for the Mini Jam 129: Poison

Limitation: You are not a hero.

The Great Hero Heribert is going on a great quest. But you are not Heribert, you are just his Potion-Supplier. Your daily routine includes collecting materials, brewing poisons and potions and selling them to Heribert to pay your rent.

  1. Collect Items in the woods by clicking on them. Your basket can hold a Maximum of 12 Items. 
  2. Drag and Drop Items into the cauldron to mix potions. 
  3. Click Bottle Potion to finish and sell your creation to earn Gold. 
  4. Repeat until Rent is due.

Escape - Back to Main Menu

You cannot win this game. You pay rent forever or get evicted. It is what it is.

Xanashea - Programming
Stegoratops - Music, Programming, Foley
soelna - Art
